page.title: 03Shops in Saffron Walden
page.content: There are no really large shops in Saffron Walden. Apart from shops like newsagents and tobacconists nearly all the shops are in the town centre to thesouth of the market place. The largest shops are International, Budgens, Co-op and Woolworths. None of these are as large as their counterparts in other towns such as Cambridge. There are a large number of small shops selling specialised foods, clothes, antiques or luxury goods. This is still in spite of the recession a fairly wealthy area. The prices are above what we would pay for the same goods in Harlow which is where there are large department stores.
